subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Coaches have long carried notes about plays, but in recent years they have embraced the outsized play card, making the computer-generated, weather-resistant accessory as common on the sideline as Gatorade.
snippet: Coaches have long carried notes about plays, but in recent years they have embraced the outsized play card, making the computer-generated, weather-resistant accessory as common on the sideline as Gatorade.
